title.rendered: Virtual Recruiting This Fall and Beyond

content.rendered:
Watch this webinar for a conversation with talent acquisition leaders about their opinion on whether virtual recruiting is here to stay. 

This discussion features Scott McQuillan from Deloitte and Lane Garnett from Discover and is moderated by Christine Cruzvergara, Handshake’s VP of Higher Education and Student Success. 

Our speakers share takeaways from their first all-virtual recruiting season and visionary tactics for hiring talent in an increasingly digital world this fall and beyond.

Want more virtual recruiting insights?

In a recent survey, we asked 1,000 college students about their experience conducting a virtual job search — what do students like about virtual recruiting, and what would they prefer to change? Read the latest insights in our student insights infographic.

View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: A panel discussion with Deloitte and Discover
